name: FreightCar America, Inc.
description: FreightCar America, Inc. is a leading manufacturer of freight cars in North America, specializing in producing a wide range of railcars. Founded in 1901 and headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, the company has a rich history and is recognized for its commitment to quality, innovation, and customer service. FreightCar America designs and produces various types of railcars, including coal, covered hopper, and intermodal cars, catering to the needs of the rail industry and its customers. The company focuses on providing customized solutions to meet the evolving demands of freight transportation, emphasizing safety, efficiency, and sustainability. With a strong emphasis on advanced manufacturing techniques, FreightCar America leverages technology to enhance the performance and durability of its products. The company is also dedicated to environmental stewardship and continuously seeks to improve its manufacturing processes to reduce its carbon footprint. FreightCar America aims to be the preferred supplier for railcar solutions, driving forward the growth of the rail industry while adapting to changing market dynamics and customer needs.

seo.meta_title: FreightCar America, Inc. | Leading Manufacturer of Freight Cars in North America
seo.meta_description: Explore FreightCar America, Inc., a top manufacturer of freight cars in North America. Discover their innovative products, commitment to quality, and industry leadership.

faq.question: What does FreightCar America manufacture?
faq.answer: FreightCar America manufactures a variety of freight cars, including coal cars, covered hopper cars, and intermodal cars.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of FreightCar America?
faq.answer: Jim Meyer is the CEO of FreightCar America, Inc.

faq.question: Where is FreightCar America headquartered?
faq.answer: FreightCar America is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, USA.
